translation.en: In March of 1983,
a massive pulse of interstellar cosmic rays
translation.es: un pulso masivo de rayos cósmicos interestelares

translation.en: struck the earth and its population.
translation.es: embistió contra la Tierra y su población.

translation.en: These cosmic rays triggered a genetic transformation in a select few…

Unfortunately, these superpowers were only unlocked in rare individuals,

These new superhumans came to be known…
as Miscreants.

translation.es: pinzas de cangrejo, cangrejo cáncer, cangrejo azul, camarones…

translation.en: I didn't know we were getting food and entertainment.
translation.es: Así que hacen comida y entretenimiento.

translation.en: - It is fun! - Jimmy Jokes.
Hey, are you pitching the tower, the seafood tower to a half- crab?
translation.es: ¿Le ofreces la torre de mariscos a un medio cangrejo?

translation.en: - Jesus. - Recommending that to me, huh?
- That takes a lot of stones. - What is this, the cannibal table?
translation.es: - Sí que tienes agallas. - ¿Es un menú caníbal?

translation.en: You gonna offer me a 32- year- old woman named Lydia?
translation.es: ¿Me ofrecerás una mujer de 32 años llamada Lydia?

translation.en: Because I'm 32.
I believe it and I won't offer you that. I'll be sensible next time.
translation.es: Le creo y no le ofreceré eso. Tendré más cuidado.

translation.en: Connect with your guests better.
I am so sorry, sir. I didn't see your pincers.
translation.es: Lo siento mucho. No vi sus pinzas.

translation.en: I apologize for raising my voice,
translation.es: Yo me disculpo por levantar la voz,

translation.en: but I got bit on the ball bag by a radioactive crab,
translation.es: pero un cangrejo radioactivo me mordió las canicas

translation.en: and I used to love shellfish.
So, my fuse is a little short. This is a trigger environment for me.
translation.es: Por eso estoy tan irritable. Este ambiente me altera.

translation.en: - I understand. - Okay.
I'm gonna need a minute. Why don't you take off?
translation.es: Necesito un minuto. ¿Nos dejas a solas?

translation.en: No problem.
- They're just jealous. - 'Cause of who I'm sitting with maybe.
translation.es: - Están celosos. - Me envidian la acompañante.

translation.en: Anything on that menu look good?
I was thinking about chicken, but I was afraid you might be half- chicken.
translation.es: Estaba pensando en el pollo, pero temía que fueras medio pollo.

translation.en: Ha. No, no. Just crab and man.
A lot of man. I was gonna order the chicken too,
translation.es: Mucho hombre. Iba a pedir pollo también,

translation.en: but unfortunately, I like my chicken the way you get it in the crab traps,
translation.es: pero, por desgracia, me gusta como se lo dan a los cangrejos,

translation.en: - and that's raw. -
- What happened? - I just got…
Do you like raw chicken, too?
Ever since… kind of what I've gone through,
translation.es: Desde que pasé por lo que pasé,

translation.en: physically, I've had a kind of insatiable…
translation.es: físicamente, tengo como un antojo insaciable

translation.en: craving for raw chicken myself.
Come here.
So, you tracked me down, you know?
What do you wanna know?
I just need to know whose side you're on.
translation.es: Necesito saber de qué lado estás.

translation.en: What are you doin'?
I'm just butterin' your knuckle.
I know things are weird between us because we had harsh words.
translation.es: Sé que las cosas están raras porque nos dijimos cosas feas

translation.en: Yes, because I threw the city bus even though you said, Do not.
translation.es: y sí, porque lancé el autobús aunque dijiste que no lo hiciera.

translation.en: And it didn't make it any better than whatever the city bus thing did.
translation.es: Y tampoco ayuda en nada que arreglar lo del autobús

translation.en: It's gonna cost a million dollars and I wish I'd stop talking.
translation.es: seguro costará un millón de dólares y ojalá pudiera cerrar la boca.

translation.en: I'm like, worse than Tom in accounting who's like, My ledger.
translation.es: Soy peor que Tom, el contador: Mi libro de contabilidad.

translation.en: He always smells like old lady liniment or like an old lady chafing
translation.es: Siempre huele a loción de vieja o a anciana irritada.

translation.en: and now I'm almost worse than Tom, if that's possible.
translation.es: Y ahora soy casi peor que Tom, si es posible.

translation.en: - Tom, I'm gonna have to call you back. - No problem.
translation.es: - Tom, te llamo luego. - No hay problema.

translation.en: Tom, just ki-- Gotcha! April Fools.
translation.es: Tom, era broma. ¡Caíste! ¡Día de los Inocentes!

translation.en: - Just not in April.  Is he gone? - He's gone.
It's, uh, so much more money than a million bucks.
translation.es: Es mucho más que un millón de dólares.

translation.en: - More? - It's okay. I'm gonna cover it.
And no one was hurt. Somehow.
translation.es: Y nadie resultó herido, de milagro.

translation.en: Yeah.
I heard you were on a date.
It was really more of a fact- finding mission.
translation.es: Fue más bien una misión de reconocimiento.

translation.en: I… I found out what The King is up to.
And that little party he's throwing, it's just like a group funeral.
translation.es: Y esa fiesta que está organizando no es más que un funeral grupal.

translation.en: He's gonna take those people that didn't vote for him,
translation.es: Llevará a toda la gente que no lo votó a un edificio

translation.en: put 'em in a building, blow it to smithereens.
translation.es: Llevará a toda la gente que no lo votó a un edificio y lo volará en pedacitos.

translation.en: - How did you get this information? - Hmm?
Who told you?
The King's lost it since the election. I'm gonna get out of the game.
translation.es: El Rey enloqueció desde las elecciones, así que pienso largarme.

translation.en: Who-- Who told you? What?
What happened to your buttons?
Ooh, that's a great start. Yep. Ooh.
The Crab? You're saying it negatively.
translation.es: - ¿El Cangrejo? - Lo dices como algo negativo.

translation.en: The Crab? Oh my-- The Crab?
- Now, I-- - I knew you were lookin' at him weird.
translation.es: Sabía que lo habías mirado raro.

translation.en: Don't point at me! Don't point at me! Don't judge- y point at me.
translation.es: ¡No me señales! ¡No me señales como juzgándome!

translation.en: Did you get surf and turfed?
Surf and turf is not a thing. But I did.
What did I find?
What is that? Did you take that from the restaurant, you little outlaw?
translation.es: ¿Qué es eso? ¿Lo tomaste del restaurante, bandida?

translation.en: Of course not. I always keep an Old Bay in my bra.
translation.es: No, siempre tengo especias en mi sostén.

translation.en: You never know when you have to season something tasty.
translation.es: Nunca se sabe cuándo hay que condimentar algo.

translation.en: That's tender. Don't forget Mr. Right.
translation.es: Qué tierno. Y el lado derecho.

translation.en: - I couldn't forget about him. Believe it. - Powder, Mommy.
translation.es: - No iba a olvidarlo, créeme. - Sazóname, mami.

translation.en: I'm gonna throw you in that hot tub and have myself a low- country boil!
translation.es: Te arrojaré a ese jacuzzi y te herviré a fuego lento.

translation.en: He was-- Don't.
He was, you know, very charming.
And he's very good with his…
translation.es: Y es muy bueno con sus…

translation.en: Honey! He's a crab!
I know, but I love crab.
I know this is gonna sound crazy, but I really think we can trust him.
translation.es: Sé que sonará a locura, pero creo que podemos confiar en él.

translation.en: I don't know we should be getting info from a Miscreant.
translation.es: Yo no confiaría en información de un malhechor.

translation.en: Well, he's Half- creant.
Half- Korean?
No. That's what I said. Not half- Korean, he's a Half- creant.
translation.es: No. Eso dije yo. No medio Melchor, es medio malhechor.

translation.en: There's something about him. Somewhere in there, he's a good guy.
translation.es: No sé, tiene algo. Siento que, en el fondo, es un buen tipo.

translation.en: Coming from me, that might not mean much, because of the bus,
translation.es: Viniendo de mí, quizá no signifique mucho, por lo del autobús,

translation.en: and, you know, I barged in here and took your power,
translation.es: y porque llegué aquí y te robé tu poder,

translation.en: which is probably the cooler power, even before I said it wasn't, but it kind of is.
translation.es: que es el más genial, aunque dije lo contrario, pero es cierto.

translation.en: Oh, Lydi…
Sometimes I don't know if I'm mad at you because you always go crazy
translation.es: A veces no sé si estoy enojada contigo porque siempre haces cosas disparatadas

translation.en: or if I'm really just mad at myself because… I never do.
translation.es: o si estoy enojada conmigo misma porque… yo nunca hago esas cosas.

translation.en: Well, we can't both be nuts.
translation.es: No podemos ser locas las dos.

translation.en: Let's just figure out how we can stop The King.
translation.es: Por ahora, pensemos cómo detener al Rey.

translation.en: I know you can do anything you put that big brain to.
translation.es: Sé que puedes hacer lo que te propongas.

translation.en: I mean, look at me.
You made a loser into something special.
translation.es: Transformaste a una perdedora en algo especial.

translation.en: Lydi…
Even though I was dumb enough to let us drift apart,
translation.es: Aunque fui una tonta por dejar que nos distanciáramos,

translation.en: you've always been special.
Thanks, Em.
Not to kill the mood, but Allie's been listening to your entire conversation.
translation.es: Lamento interrumpir, pero Allie estuvo escuchándolas

translation.en: She says you need to wrap up this after- school special, suit up,
translation.es: y dice que terminen este drama adolescente,

translation.en: and meet her in the tech room. Immediately.
translation.es: se cambien y vayan a la sala de tecnología. Rápido.

translation.en: Let's go.
Bingo, we'll get you in through a back entrance.
translation.es: Bingo, te meteremos por una entrada trasera.

translation.en: Once you're in and can determine where the bomb is,
translation.es: Una vez que determines dónde está la bomba,

translation.en: Hammer will follow in, get the bomb,
translation.es: Martillo te seguirá, buscará la bomba

translation.en: and get it out of the building, where it can be properly disarmed.
translation.es: y la sacará del edificio, donde la desmontaremos.

translation.en: Can you read me?
Hammer down.
- What does that mean? - It's lingo for Yep.
Get into position by the door and wait for my signal.
translation.es: En posición junto a la puerta y esperen a mi señal.

translation.en: This could take a while.
Would you go get me more coffee? I wanna be alert.
translation.es: ¿Podrías traerme más café? Quiero estar despierta.

translation.en: You hearing music?
It's Seal. I programmed him into the suit.
translation.es: Es Seal. Lo programé en el traje.

translation.en: Em, we're on a mission here.
You think I don't know that?
There are thousands of lives in danger and we're stuck and I'm nervous.
translation.es: Hay miles de vidas en peligro y estamos aquí afuera, estoy nerviosa.

translation.en: Okay.
We have to succeed, Lydi.
This will give us the relaxed focus to finish the mission.
translation.es: La canción nos relajará para completar la misión.

translation.en: What do I know? I'm nervous too. I do have to admit, the song's got a good hook.
translation.es: ¿Qué sé yo? También estoy nerviosa. Admito que la canción tiene su encanto.

translation.en: Do you have eyes on them? Answer me.
Watch your mouth. You made a deal with The King, not with me.
translation.es: Cuida tus modales. Hiciste un trato con el Rey, no conmigo.

translation.en: They are on the loading dock on the south side of the building.
translation.es: Están en el muelle de carga en el lado sur del edificio.

translation.en: The next right. Other right.
translation.es: A la derecha. La otra derecha.

translation.en: Hurry up! They're not gonna stand there all night.
translation.es: Apresúrate. No se quedarán ahí toda la noche.

translation.en: Wow, you're bad.
Get away from the door, now!
- You okay? - Allie double- crossed us.
The King paid her off. She was leading Laser right to you.
translation.es: Creo que el Rey le pagó. Guio a Láser hacia ustedes.

translation.en: Your singing sucks.
You know, killing people is not a recognized hobby.
translation.es: Matar gente no es un pasatiempo aceptado.

translation.en: I can't knit.
Time to die!
Time to take out the trash.
- Holy crap! - Some people just deserve a dumpster.
This was a set- up.
Allie's knocked out. Security's on the way.
translation.es: Allie está inconsciente y ya viene seguridad.

translation.en: - I gotta come help. - It's not safe. Stay home.
translation.es: - Iré a ayudarlas. - No es seguro. Quédate allá.

translation.en: I'm on my way.
Tracy?
Let's go.
Who's ready to hear from our next mayor?
translation.es: ¿Listos para oír a nuestra próxima alcaldesa?

translation.en: I have a cold, a cold, that's why I'm not touching…
translation.es: Estoy resfriado, por eso no toco nada.

translation.en: Thank you. Well, thank you, Mr. King.
It's The-- It's The King.
It's The King. King is a dog's name. Okay?
translation.es: Es el Rey. Rey solo es nombre de perro, ¿sí?

translation.en: Okay.
Oh, is this…
Sorry. Crushin' it.
Is this thing… Can you… Okay. Thank you.
Have a good time.
- Thank you-- - It's gonna be a blast!
This is an excellent example - of how together, we can revitalize… - Boom. …the city of Chicago.
translation.es: Este es un excelente ejemplo de que juntos podemos revitalizar Chicago.

translation.en: Through collaboration and cooperation, we can…
translation.es: Mediante la colaboración y la cooperación, podremos…

translation.en: Use your big brain, Em. Where would he hide the bomb?
translation.es: Usa tu cerebrote, Em. ¿Dónde esconderías la bomba?

translation.en: The party's on the 30th floor, there'd be security there.
translation.es: La fiesta es en el piso 30, habrá seguridad allí.

translation.en: And the basement's so far away.
translation.es: Y el sótano está muy lejos.

translation.en: But wait, Rachel Gonzales' campaign office is on the 29th floor.
translation.es: Pero la oficina de campaña de Rachel Gonzales está en el piso 29.

translation.en: That's why he picked this building.
- - Where the hell is Laser? She should be here by now.
translation.es: ¿Dónde diablos está Láser? Ya debería estar aquí.

translation.en: From where?
- From killing Thunder Force. - Yeah.
translation.es: - De matar a Fuerza Trueno. - Claro.

translation.en: She told me she's gonna make 'em into s'mores, which--
translation.es: Me dijo que las haría puré,

translation.en: The timing is great because they're really startin' to bug me.
translation.es: lo cual me resulta conveniente porque ya me estaban molestando.

translation.en: Yeah.
You know, I don't really like this new crab with a conscience bit.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? No me gusta esto del cangrejo con conciencia.

translation.en: I like my crab with a little hollandaise sauce, maybe a parsley garnish.
translation.es: Me gusta mi cangrejo con salsa holandesa, tal vez con un poco de perejil.

translation.en: We're good in that.
Do we have a problem?
We don't have a problem. All is good. Let's slaughter them all.
translation.es: Ningún problema. Todo bien. Que empiece la masacre. Matemos a esas hijas de…

translation.en: Kill those sons of bitches…
translation.es: Que empiece la masacre. Matemos a esas hijas de…

translation.en: Thanks for the help.
- Kenny, call her. - You've killed Kenny.
I… I did?
Yep.
- Who's left? - Andrew's left.
Yeah, I can call, sir.
- Fine. - Oh, ca-- Okay, yeah. Sorry.
Uh, Laser, do you copy?
- Do you copy? - Yeah, kind of.
- What's she saying? - Hmm?
- The red- head threw a dumpster. - A red- head threw a dumpster at her.
translation.es: - La pelirroja me tiró un basurero. - Una pelirroja le tiró un basurero.

translation.en: What? Well, did they get away? Where… where are they?
- Put her on speaker phone! - Andrew, you idiot!
- Laser, where are they? - No idea. Probably going after the bomb.
translation.es: - Láser, ¿dónde están? - Ni idea. Buscando la bomba, supongo.

translation.en: After all that.
- Hang up, you stupid… - Down! Hang it up! Moron!
We gotta go back up. Let's end this. Hit 29.
translation.es: Debemos subir. Terminemos con esto. Al 29.

translation.en: Ah, so close.
- Twenty-- - I know, they're not made for, um…
- It'll take us a while. Okay. - Twenty- nine! I'm surrounded by idiots.
translation.es: - Tardaremos, pero… - ¡Al 29! Estoy rodeado de idiotas.

translation.en: Sorry.
If you were a narcissistic megalomaniac, where would you hide a bomb?
translation.es: Si fueras un megalómano narcisista, ¿dónde pondrías la bomba?

translation.en: My guess is a place of power. Her office, maybe.
translation.es: En un lugar de poder. ¿La oficina de ella?

translation.en: Well, well…
Evening, ladies. I'm assuming you're both here.
translation.es: Buenas noches, damas. Asumo que están ambas.

translation.en: I gotta tell you,
translation.es: Admito que me pone mal que sigan vivas.

translation.en: - I'm bummed you're not dead. - I'm sorry to disappoint you, King.
translation.es: Admito que me pone mal que sigan vivas. Lamento decepcionarte, Rey.

translation.en: Okay, it's The King. Okay?
The King! It's three letters! Why doesn't anybody get this?
translation.es: El Rey. ¡Son dos palabras! ¿Por qué nadie lo dice bien?

translation.en: - It's not tough. - The King. Like, The Boss.
translation.es: - No es difícil. - El Rey. Como el jefe.

translation.en: You on my left?
The man.
- The bomb. - Nice, sir.
Thanks. The big, beautiful bomb.
translation.es: Gracias. La bomba grande y hermosa.

translation.en: You didn't think I was gonna let nagging chicks
translation.es: No creyeron que dejaría que un par de bobas

translation.en: get their hands on my big, beautiful bomb, did you?
translation.es: pusieran sus manos en mi bomba grande y hermosa, ¿o sí?

translation.en: You know what they say about men who claim to have big, big bombs.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué dicen de los que se atribuyen bombas grandes?

translation.en: Little, tiny fuses.
Ladies, meet the henchmen.
translation.es: Señoritas, les presento a los secuaces.

translation.en: Hi, I'm Andy or Andrew. Either one.
translation.es: Hola, soy Andy o Andrew. Como prefieran.

translation.en: Who was that? Was that Andrew?
Yeah.
Damn it! I wanted to kill Andrew.
Enough with the bullets.
Come on, Thunder Force. I'm ready to get my hands dirty.
translation.es: Vamos, Fuerza Trueno. Estoy listo para algo de acción.

translation.en: Of course. He's a Miscreant, too.
I thought you were just run- of- the- mill dirtbag, but you're a Miscreant dirtbag.
translation.es: Creí que eras un imbécil común, pero eres un imbécil malhechor.

translation.en: You buried the lead on that one, Jerry.
- You're a waste of butter, Crab. - I didn't grab the butter.
translation.es: - Eres un desperdicio de mantequilla. - Yo no me la puse.

translation.en: I got a job to do, so let's get this over with.
translation.es: Tengo cosas que hacer, así que apurémonos.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Let's dance, dummy.
He's stronger than I thought…
translation.es: Más fuerte de lo que pensé.

translation.en: File you under trash!
She's got a real sexy violent streak.
translation.es: Tiene una faceta violenta y sexy.

translation.en: What's the matter? Cat got your tongue? Enjoy the ride!
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa? ¿Te comieron la lengua? Disfruta el paseo.

translation.en: Lydi!
Peekaboo.
Lydi!
Oh, shit!
I have this signature move. It's kind of a hug- of- death thing.
translation.es: Tengo un movimiento que me caracteriza. Es un abrazo letal.

translation.en: - - You're gonna love it.
- What's that smell? - It's the suits, we can't wash them.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es ese olor? - Son los trajes, no podemos lavarlos.

translation.en: Terrible!
This is set to extra- crispy, you donut hole.
Bye- bye, nerd!
She's not a nerd. She's smart. There's a difference.
translation.es: No es nerd. Es lista. Tiene su diferencia.

translation.en: Tracy, what have you done?
What I had to do, Mom.
Mom?
You mean, I get a crack at a family kill?
translation.es: ¿O sea que será una matanza familiar?

translation.en: You hardly ever get that chance.
translation.es: Casi nunca se me da eso.

translation.en: But first, you.
Pretty strong for a girl,
but not strong enough.
Hands off.
Jerry…
No problem.
- Mother-- - Traitor!
Bottom feeder!
- Batter up, King! - It's The Ki--
translation.es: - ¡Me toca batear, Rey! - Es el Rey…

translation.en: That one's outta the park!
I wish you hadn't done that. Are you okay?
- You guys needed help. - Jerry, you good?
translation.es: Sí, precisaban ayuda. - Jerry, ¿estás bien? - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah, good.
Where's the bomb?
translation.es: - ¿La bomba? - En la oficina de la esquina.

translation.en: - Corner office. - Got it.
translation.es: - ¿La bomba? - En la oficina de la esquina. Entendido.

translation.en: Love an ambulance.
Or a vet, you know?
Marine biologist…
Somebody's an overachiever.
Can you disarm it?
Not with the time we have left. It'll have trip wires all over it.
translation.es: - ¿Puedes desarmarla? - No en poco tiempo. Tiene cables detonadores. Podría activarla.

translation.en: I could set it off.
Good to know.
- Well, let me try. Maybe it'll work. - No, no, I can do it.
translation.es: - Lo intentaré. Quizá funcione. - No, yo puedo hacerlo.

translation.en: I'm super- fast now. I can just run it out of town.
translation.es: Soy superrápida, puedo sacarla de la ciudad.

translation.en: Look, we don't know how stable it'll be with your speed.
translation.es: Mira, no sabemos si se mantendrá estable con tu velocidad.

translation.en: You've already saved us once today. Your grandparents would be so proud.
translation.es: Ya nos salvaste una vez hoy. Tus abuelos estarían muy orgullosos.

translation.en: But if you think I'm gonna let you touch that bomb, you're out of your mind.
translation.es: Pero, si crees que te dejaré tocar esa bomba, estás loca.

translation.en: Wait.
Don't do anything crazy.
Nah. I've actually thought this one through. First time for everything.
translation.es: No. Ya lo pensé bien. Siempre hay una primera vez.

translation.en: No, Lydia.
I can't toss it out the window, people could get hurt.
translation.es: No puedo lanzarla, podría haber heridos.

translation.en: You know my body can take the impact.
I know we don't have a lot of time, so let me say this.
translation.es: No tenemos mucho tiempo, así que solo diré una cosa.

translation.en: If this goes bad, I wanna thank you for being my friend.
translation.es: Si esto sale mal, quiero agradecerte por ser mi amiga.

translation.en: You know, people wondered why we were friends 'cause we're nothing alike,
translation.es: Todos se preguntaban cómo éramos amigas si no nos parecíamos en nada,

translation.en: but I always knew you were gonna change the world.
translation.es: pero siempre supe que cambiarías el mundo.

translation.en: You're the best person I ever met. Till I met your kid.
translation.es: Eres la mejor persona que he conocido, hasta que conocí a tu hija.

translation.en: Listen to what your mom says.
I wish I always had.
translation.es: Ojalá yo le hubiera hecho caso.

translation.en: I should go.
If the bomb explodes and we're just standing here, that'd be weird.
translation.es: Si la bomba explota y seguimos aquí, sería raro.

translation.en: Lydi…
Lydi!
Lydia!
No…
Oh, no, no… stop! Stop!
Lydi?
- Oh, no! Lydia! - Lydia? Oh my god…
Lydi…
I'm sorry.
Oh, I'm sorry.
I barfed river water on you.
That was so much.
I really, really, really love this suit.
I really love it, and I don't even care if it's stinky anymore.
translation.es: Lo adoro y ya no me importa si está hediondo.

translation.en: - - We're just so happy you're alive.
- I love you guys. - We love you, honey.
- Help her up. - Oh god, help a girl up!
Quite a reaction.
Thunder Force, I wanna thank you,
and the city of Chicago wants to thank you for your tremendous bravery.
translation.es: así como toda la ciudad de Chicago, por su gran valentía.

translation.en: - Thank you, Mayor. - Yes.
Where's The King?
In custody. Alive.
You did it, Em.
You brought a Miscreant to justice. You finished the work your parents started.
translation.es: Llevaste a un malhechor a la Justicia. Terminaste el trabajo de tus padres.

translation.en: - What about Laser? - We're still lookin'.
When you catch her, and before she goes to prison,
translation.es: Cuando la atrape, y antes de llevarla a prisión,

translation.en: can I have a couple minutes? I wanna cut that ponytail off.
translation.es: ¿me daría un rato con ella? Quiero cortarle esa coleta.

translation.en: Is that a Samson and Delilah thing?
I just think she'll look really dumb with the short hai--
translation.es: No, solo creo que se verá tonta con pelo cor…

translation.en: Okay, I think I'm done.
May I empty your shoes?
- No, no, no, they're fine. - Okay, sorry.
I just-- This might be an awkward time to ask you,
translation.es: Quizá no sea el mejor momento para preguntarles,

translation.en: but I wonder if your team would like to make an official arrangement with the city.
